markdownRemark.html: A series of videos was created within the framework of the H2020 ReInHerit project. The aim of these videos is to raise awareness on Cultural Heritage management and to highlight issues related to the role of museums in our societies. This video is focusing on the theme of heritage sites.

frontmatter.title: Exploring heritage sites in the framework of ReInHerit H2020!
